sourcesContent:
import React, {Component, useState} from 'react'
import { Card, Form, Button, Alert, Container, Modal } from 'react-bootstrap'
import { FaTrashAlt, FaPencilAlt } from "react-icons/fa"
import { IoFastFood, IoLocationSharp, IoTimeSharp, IoSaveSharp } from "react-icons/io5";

function Edit(props) {
    const [show, setShow] = useState(false);

    const handleClose = () => setShow(false);
    const handleShow = () => setShow(true);

    return (
        <>
          <Button variant="light" onClick={handleShow}>
           <FaPencilAlt />
          </Button>
    
          <Modal show={show} onHide={handleClose}>
            <Modal.Header closeButton>
              <Modal.Title>Edit Record</Modal.Title>
            </Modal.Header>
            <Modal.Body>
            <Form>
                <Form.Group id="name">
                    <small>Restaurant Name: </small>
                    <Form.Control type="name" value={this.props.name} required />
                </Form.Group>

                <Form.Group id="reservation">
                    <small>Reservation: </small>
                    <Form.Control type="name" placeholder="June 6th 2021" required />
                </Form.Group>

                <Form.Group id="notes">
                    <small>Notes: </small>
                    <Form.Control type="name" placeholder="Delicious breadsticks!" required />
                </Form.Group>

                <Button className="w-100" type="submit" variant="success"><IoSaveSharp /></Button>
            </Form>
            </Modal.Body>
          </Modal>
        </>
      );
    }

export default Edit
